songs.title: Onward, Christian Soldiers
songs.lyrics:
Onward, Christian soldiers,
 Marching as to war,
 With the cross of Jesus,
 Going on before. Christ, the royal Master,
 Leads against the foe;
 Forward into battle 
 See his banners go!
 Refrain:
 Onward, Christian soldiers, 
 Marching as to war,
 With the cross of Jesus Going on before.

songs.title: Grace and Strength
songs.lyrics:
Grace flows like a river, strength like stone,
In fellowship we're never alone.
Through joy and sorrow, we remain,
Bound by honor, free from pain.
